title: can't get Thunderbird to work
content: I can't get thunderbird to work. Even tho I am putting in the right password, it keeps telling me that it is not right and that I have "imap" problems. I'm not sure what this means nor what to do about it? Please help. Dave [removed phone# from support forum]
